00045 bool GameManager::Init(NiNodePtr parent, NiPhysXScenePtr physXScene, NiApplication* app )
00046 {
00047         // read configuration file
00048         m_pGameApplication = (GameApp*)app;
00049         if (!ConfigurationManager::Get()->ReadConfigurationFile(
00050                 NiApplication::ConvertMediaFilename("data/configuration.xml")))
00051         {
00052                 NiMessageBox("Could Not Read Configuration File", "Error");
00053                 return false;
00054         }
00055 
00056         // create queen
00057         m_spQueen = NiNew Queen;
00058         if (!AddObject((GameObj3dPtr)m_spQueen, parent, physXScene))
00059         {
00060                 return false;
00061         }
00062         m_spQueen->GetAgent()->GetActor()->setGlobalPosition(NxVec3(0.0, 100.0, -200.0));
00063 
00064 
00065         //if (!LevelManager::Get()->LoadLevel(1))
00066         //{
00068         //}
00069         
00070         return true;
00071 }

00078 void GameManager::UpdateAll(float fTime)
00079 {
00080         m_fDeltaTime = m_pGameApplication->GetFrameTime();
00081         NiTListIterator it = m_lObjects.GetHeadPos();
00082         for (int i=0; i<m_lObjects.GetSize(); i++)
00083         {
00084                 GameObj3dPtr obj = m_lObjects.Get(it);
00085                 obj->Update(fTime);
00086                 it = m_lObjects.GetNextPos(it);
00087         }
00088 
00089 }

00099 bool GameManager::AddObject(GameObj3dPtr object, NiNodePtr parent)
00100 {
00101         if (object->Init(parent))
00102         {
00103                 m_lObjects.AddTail(object);
00104                 return true;
00105         }
00106         
00107         return false;
00108 }

00120 {

00122         {
00123                 m_lObjects.AddTail(object);
